name: Bokuman Artist Style
description:
Bokuman Style LORA_V1

This Lora is trained on the spicy art on Bokuman

https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/17111545

https://twitter.com/artbokus?lang=en

Due to the diversity of this artists styles the training process was quite a hassle and after alot of tests I ended up with two variants:

  • Variant Y (obedient and playes nice with other LoRAs )

  • Variant G (a problem child)

I consider Variant Y to be an absolute success 👌, it managed to learn all 3 styles of the artist (tho triggering them at will is quite challenging ).

And I Kept Variant G around because it has the interesting effect of taking over the composition over the composition wanting to make it NSFW, and even spwaning more Guys around just spice things up , so If ur feeling adventurous go head and try it 😂

Tips

  • You can use with weight between 0.8 and 1.1 depending on how many other loras used.

  • use Variant G at low weights

  • Clip skip: 2 is can really help.

  • Keyword bokuman can realy flesh out the style even more

  • This LoRA works best when used for NSFW gens but also capable of SFW gens

  • This lora tend to force super stylized proportions .

  • Adding the tag unfinished, sketch seem to trigger the artist's flat and unshaded art style used in some of his work.
